name: Pixel Samurai demo
description:
PIXEL SAMURAI

play the demo on web

A journey of a lost samurai. Encounter five samurai and challenge them to a duel. Unleash your katana strike and deflect incoming attacks. Fight for honor or die with shame.

You need to read and parry enemies attacks.

Add to your steam wishlist now 

https://store.steampowered.com/app/2017270/Pixel_Samurai/

To everyone who purchased the game on itch will also get a steam key.
